name: Pavithra Nair
greetingText: I've probably been more excited for this day than you
wishText: Hope I made you smile on your special day
textInChatBox: Happy 25th birthday to you!! Hope you have the best... etc etc.
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come and give me a big hug if you liked it.
replayText: Or click to watch it again.
